welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mossley, a charming town known for its scenic views and friendly community. We invite you to explore and discover all the beauty and character that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Manchester Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for low-cost and leisure flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly serving long-haul and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the terminal for up to 2 hours.
